controllers

Class UsersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.UsersController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class UsersController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    UserController is responsible for every action with user administration. It shows users list, render all adding, updating and registration forms and handling all get/post requests from them.

      • usersList

        public play.mvc.Result usersList()
        Render table with all registered users.
        Returns:
        Response with params to be displayed in table: list of users and users fields names

        Parameters:
        id - identificator of user to delete
        Returns:
        Response with updated list of users

      • addingUser

        public play.mvc.Result addingUser()
        Handle post request with form in it, parse it, and trying to add new user to database. After it redirects to login page or stays on current page if there was some errors.
        Returns:
        Redirects to other pages by calling theirs controllers.

      • addingUserAdmin

        public play.mvc.Result addingUserAdmin()
        Handle post request with form in it, parse it, and trying to add new user to database if user added by admin. After it redirects to userslist page or stays on current page if there were some errors.
        Returns:
        Redirects to other pages by calling theirs controllers.

      • renderUpdateUserInfo

        public play.mvc.Result renderUpdateUserInfo(java.lang.Integer id)
        Render update form for updating user`s info as admin
        Parameters:
        id - identificator of user to be updated
        Returns:
        Response with form with data of user fill in it

      • updateUserInfo

        public play.mvc.Result updateUserInfo(java.lang.Integer id)
        Handle form with data, parse it and try to update user`s info in database for admin.
        Parameters:
        id - identificator of user to be updated
        Returns:
        redirects to o userslist page if its ok and stays on current page if there were some errors
